original_title: Between The Lines Sara Bareilles Live At The Fillmore
overview: "Between The Lines" is exactly that. It is not only a concert, but a film that shares what happened backstage and in the days surrounding the Fillmore show. This is very much a personal portrait of who Sara Bareilles is and where she comes from, including a performance in Sausalito with some of her best friends...all against the beautiful backdrop of the Northern California Coast.
title: Between The Lines Sara Bareilles Live At The Fillmore
